tasks.label: git-push
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: replace fragile regex parsing with babel in SectionPreview" && git push

tasks.label: build-project
tasks.command: npm run build

tasks.label: install-ga
tasks.command: npm install @next/third-parties

tasks.label: git-commit-all
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: ultra site audit optimizations + google analytics + reddit marketing assets"

tasks.label: check_git_status
tasks.command: git status

tasks.label: git_status
tasks.command: git status

tasks.label: ship-it
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: marketing assets, google ads, analytics, and performance optimizations" && git push

tasks.label: organize_ai_context
tasks.command: git mv FOUNDER_MEMORY.md ai_context/FOUNDER_MEMORY.md && git mv TRANSMISSION.md ai_context/TRANSMISSION_LOGS.md && git mv AUDIT_REPORT.md ai_context/TECHNICAL_AUDIT.md && git mv CHANGELOG.md ai_context/CHANGELOG.md && git mv marketing_assets.md ai_context/MARKETING_ASSETS.md

tasks.label: cleanup_root
tasks.command: rm FOUNDER_MEMORY.md TRANSMISSION.md AUDIT_REPORT.md CHANGELOG.md marketing_assets.md && git add . && git commit -m "chore: consolidate AI context and documentation into ai_context/ folder"

tasks.label: check_status_before_commit
tasks.command: git status

tasks.label: final_commit_push
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "chore: consolidate project documentation and context into ai_context/" && git push

tasks.label: verify_git_status
tasks.command: git status

tasks.label: force_commit_push
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "chore: save point - final context organization" && git push

tasks.label: install_next_third_parties
tasks.command: npm install @next/third-parties

tasks.label: commit_dependency
tasks.command: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "fix: add @next/third-parties dependency" && git push

tasks.label: install_package_retry
tasks.command: npm install @next/third-parties

tasks.label: manual_fix_push
tasks.command: git add package.json && git commit -m "fix: manually add @next/third-parties to package.json" && git push

tasks.label: push_npmrc_fix
tasks.command: git add .npmrc && git commit -m "fix: add .npmrc to resolve peer dependency conflict" && git push

tasks.label: fix_babel_types
tasks.command: git add components/SectionPreview.tsx components/BuildFlowController.tsx && git commit -m "fix: handle potential null return from babel transform" && git push

tasks.label: git-add
tasks.command: git add .

tasks.label: remove-internal-pages
tasks.command: rm app/campaign/page.tsx app/brand/page.tsx

tasks.label: commit-fix-loophole
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: close demo mode loophole - force signup to build" && git push

tasks.label: commit-signup-optimization
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: optimize signup flow with tracking, mobile UI, and param preservation" && git push

tasks.label: commit-auth-fixes
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: complete auth flow fixes - CTAs route to signup, outdated copy removed, tracking in place" && git push

tasks.label: cleanup_docs
tasks.command: mv MARKETING_CODEX.md ai_context/MARKETING_CODEX.md && rm AI_MEMORY.md FOUNDER_MEMORY.md TRANSMISSION.md TECHNICAL_CODEX.md marketing_assets.md CHANGELOG.md

tasks.label: commit_changes
tasks.command:
git add . && git commit -m "Phase 1 Complete: First Contact & Trust Upgrade.

- Implemented 'What + Why' logic in System Status (app/page.tsx).
- Neutralized 'Creepy AI' vibes in Consciousness Engine (lib/consciousness.ts).
- Grounded Chat & Witness feedback loops (components/Chat.tsx, components/TheWitness.tsx).
- Upgraded Typography to Inter + JetBrains Mono (app/layout.tsx).
- Established 'Singularity' Brand Protocols in ai_context/."

tasks.label: commit-dependency-fix
tasks.command: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "fix: add @next/third-parties dependency"

tasks.label: commit-ghost-changes
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: optimize HatchCharacter visibility - builder-only, conditional on tier/visits"

tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: switch builder to Claude 3.5 Sonnet and handle sparse inputs"

tasks.label: commit-free-limits
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: limit free tier to 3 generations/refinements in builder"

tasks.label: commit-lite-fix
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: enable Lite ($9) tier in checkout validation and webhook types"

tasks.label: commit-build-fix
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: resolve duplicate subscription declaration in SectionBuilder"

tasks.label: commit-env-refactor

tasks.label: commit-ux-polish
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: UX polish - Reddit socials, Welcome Modal, Ghost logic, and Homepage CTA"

tasks.label: commit-ux-polish-retry
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "fix: UX polish - Reddit socials, Welcome Modal, Ghost logic, and Homepage CTA"

tasks.label: commit-launch-experience
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: implement human touch launch experience - void animation, reddit link, manual entry" && git push

tasks.label: commit-preview-fix
tasks.command: git add components/SectionPreview.tsx && git commit -m "fix: compact preview toolbar and ensure full width on desktop" && git push

tasks.command: git commit -m "feat: unify site aesthetic - replace legacy colors with Singularity palette (Emerald/Teal/Zinc)"

tasks.command: git add components/HomepageWelcome.tsx && git commit -m "fix: prevent automatic redirect on homepage for returning users - add Resume Session option instead" && git push

tasks.command: git add ai_context/ && git commit -m "chore: consolidate AI context - establish Singularity Identity and restore Transmission Logs" && git push
